import AsideNav from '../components/AsideNav' import Header from '../components/Header' import '../index.css' import calories from '../imgs/calories-icon.png' import protein from '../imgs/protein-icon.png' import carbs from '../imgs/carbs-icon.png' import fat from '../imgs/fat-icon.png' import Weight from '../components/Weight' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function UserInterface(props) { const [surveyData, setSurveyData] = useState({}) const [isDataLoading, setDataLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { async function fetchSurvey() { setDataLoading(true) try { const response = await fetch(`../mocks/activities.json`) const { data } = await response.json() setSurveyData(data) } catch (err) { console.log('===== error =====', err) setError(true) } finally { setDataLoading(false) } } fetchSurvey() }, []) return ( <> {console.log(surveyData.data, isDataLoading, error)}

Bonjour{' '} {props.match.params.userId && 'Thomas'}

Félicitation ! Vous avez explosé vos objectifs hier 👏

123kCal

Calories

123g

Protéines

123g

Glucides

123g

Lipides

{props.match.params.userId}
) } export default UserInterface
